subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jorge Posada hit a game-winning single in the 12th inning on Saturday, but the victory was tempered by Chien-Ming Wang’s departure from the game with shoulder discomfort.
snippet: Jorge Posada hit a game-winning single in the 12th inning on Saturday, but the victory was tempered by Chien-Ming Wang’s departure from the game with shoulder discomfort.
